title: (x) Elegant handwritten script - Montague Script {self (Todd M)}
content:
I'm trying to remember what font this is. I can't remember where I got it, but I'd like to buy it.

It's a slightly loose, yet formal handwritten script with some mildly swashed caps.

thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018121503im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-7_4307.jpg)
author: Todd Masui

comments.content:
Well, I solved my own case.

[Montague Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018121503/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000367)

Well done! I was searching on the wrong track and browsed all [Rob Leuschke fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018121503/http:/new.myfonts.com/person/Rob_Leuschke/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DHome%2520Service%2520Featured%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D21).
